process-def.name: :RBA-AD-VMware_Infrastructure:Utilities:VM_Monitoring_Operations:Construct Item for Retrieve VM CPU Usage

input.description:
virtual machine The name of the virtual machine whose CPU usage details need to be retrieved
Valid value: String

performance refresh rate The provider's refresh rate. If any other value is provided then the output may be
- blank: in case Performance statistics is not collected at that interval by Virtual Center. - collection of metrics: in case Performance statistics is collected at that interval by Virtual Center.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <virtual-machine>${virtual machine}</virtual-machine> <query-spec> <interval-id>${performance refresh rate}</interval-id> </query-spec> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Constructs <items> for Retrieve VM CPU Usage operation
